summary: In this final installment of the Blind Dead series, a doctor and his wife move to a small inhospitable coastal village where he plans to start a practice only to discover that undead demon-worshiping Templar Knights haunt the place.
cast: Víctor Petit|María Kosty|Sandra Mozarowsky|José Antonio Calvo|Julia Saly|Javier de Rivera|Pilar Vela|Fernando Villena|María Vidal|Oscar Phens|Susana Estrada|Luis Ciges
title: La noche de las gaviotas
